channel.title: Port forwarding done everything! firewall you name it
channel.description: Hi there i'm trying to portforward on my sky hub everythings set up firewall has had extra rules added for inbound and outbound udp/tcp i dont know if its my source or not! cheers would anyone teamview with me and please help me out would really appreicate it

item.title: Port forwarding done everything! firewall you name it
item.dc:creator: @miller4 miller4
item.description:
@miller4 wrote:

Did you portforward your IPv4 and not just some random number?

http://canyouseeme.org

Read full topic

item.title: Port forwarding done everything! firewall you name it
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

If your server starts up without errors, but you can’t connect, it’s likely to be your ports.

Thinking you’ve done them, and forwarding them correctly are two different things. There any many tutorials on this so have a look around the forums. Disable any firewalls you may have to see if it makes a difference.

Read full topic
item.source: Port forwarding done everything! firewall you name it
